EstVoisin

public static boolean EstVoisin(Pion coup,
                                Pion pion)
Determine whether two given pawns are direct neighbors on the goban.

Parameters:
coup - the first pawn
pion - the first pawn
Returns:
true if both pawns are neighbors false otherwise
